title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Draperie", designed 1911–17
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount at lower right: DESSIN: "DRAPERIE"; Stamped in red on mount: WIENER/WERK/STÄTTE; Inscribed in blue crayon on mount, upper right corner: 111
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Abstract swag motif with cut out heart shapes above and below in green on turquoise-green background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design:  Draperie", designed 1911–17.
designed 1911–17. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-732.
